entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 7:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 this evening then becoming north 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
